listitem.para: the connection addrress family of the connection; currently the accepted values are ipv4 (the default); or ipv6. This option is confusing, especially when doing IPv4-in-IPv6 or IPv6-in-IPv4 tunnels. The developers hope to remove this option in the near future for proper auto-detection. For now, set connaddrfamily= to the family of the *subnet= options, and if those are not defined, to the family of the left=/right= options.
IPv6 is supported with NETKEY since openswan 2.4 and with KLIPS since Openswan 2.6.33
